data.title: Catholic College & University Alumni in the U.S. Congress
data.meta_description: Catholic College & University Alumni in the U.S. Congress
data.text:
The following is a listing of the members of the 114th U.S. Congress who are graduates of Catholic colleges and universities:

Senator Barbara A. Mikulski

(D-MD) Elected 1986

B.A. Loyola University Maryland (1958)

Senator Robert P. Casey, Jr.

(D-PA) Elected 2006

B.A. College of the Holy Cross (1982)

J.D. Catholic University (1988)

Jesuit Volunteer Corps (1983)

(D-NJ) Appointed and Elected 2006

(R-AK) Elected 2014
